Articles.Content:
Hello Everybody!

I'm a new arrival at the space port and just wanted to say hi, but had some trouble posting in the Welcome thread, so here goes for First Post Mk 2.

Hopefully this weekend I'll get around to posting some mission logs/stories and maybe a few of the gazillion screenshots I keep taking for, until now, no reason.

See you out there,

Icarium
Weclome! See you in the Mission Reports Forum and Pictures threads!
Thank you. Hah, I just realised this isn't actually on space port, but close enough eh!
